hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f ~/setProxy.sh ]; then . ~/setProxy.sh fi
cd initial-configuration/jupyterhub
docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-all-in-one-jupyterhub:LATEST .
docker pull `grep DockerSpawner.image /usr/local/docker-config/jupyterhub_config.py | cut -d ' ' -f 3 | sed "s/'//g" `
docker stop jupyterhub | echo docker rm jupyterhub | echo
docker run --network=picsure --expose=49152-65535 --restart always --name jupyterhub -v "/usr/local/docker-config/jupyterhub_config.py:/srv/jupyterhub/jupyterhub_config.py" -v "/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock" -v "/usr/local/docker-config/jupyterhub/:/data/" -d hms-dbmi/pic-sure-all-in-one-jupyterhub:LATEST jupyterhub -f /srv/jupyterhub/jupyterhub_config.py
